short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance browsing with Select AI: Multilingual convos, contextual queries, effortless history.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock the power of artificial intelligence with Select AI, the ultimate Chrome extension designed to enhance your browsing experience.

Select AI allows you to input your own API key, giving you complete control over the conversation. Interact with AI Select using your preferred language, as it supports a wide range of languages beyond the default English. From Spanish to Mandarin, French to Hindi, the choice is yours. Immerse yourself in seamless conversations like never before.

When multiple items are selected on the same page, the continuity of the conversation remains intact. It's like having a reliable assistant by your side, understanding every detail of your discussion.

Highlight text on your screen and select "Select AI" from the context menu and see the magic happen.
